languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: на орбите мира-столицы замечен флот Даргонуса — герб династии фон Валанциус не оставляет в этом сомнений. Вокруг планеты остались следы недавних боевых действий — металлические осколки, мусор и сгустки энергии. Большинство кораблей в боевой готовности, но есть и поврежденные единицы. Агрессии со стороны флота не наблюдается — напротив, капитаны приветствуют вас".

"Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius coat of arms on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: на орбите мира-столицы замечен флот Даргонуса — герб династии фон Валанциус не оставляет в этом сомнений. Вокруг планеты остались следы недавних боевых действий — металлические осколки, мусор и сгустки энергии. Большинство кораблей в боевой готовности, но есть и поврежденные единицы. Агрессии со стороны флота не наблюдается — напротив, капитаны приветствуют вас".

traits.locale_text: "Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius crest on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

"Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius crest on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

"Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius crest on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

"Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius coat of arms on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

languages.text: “准备报告，舰长大人。我们在首都世界周围的轨道上看到了达戈努斯的舰队。毫无疑问，舰船上的纹章属于冯·瓦兰修斯家族。这颗行星最近发生过战斗，行星附近残存着金属碎片、飞船残骸与能量团的痕迹。绝大部分战舰依然可以正常作战，少量飞船处于受损状态。舰队并没有叛乱的痕迹，而且恰恰相反，每位舰长都在高呼您的名字。”
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius coat of arms on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

traits.locale_text: “准备报告，舰长大人。我们在首都世界周围的轨道上看到了达戈努斯的舰队。毫无疑问，舰船上的纹章属于冯·瓦兰修斯家族。这颗行星最近发生过战斗，行星附近残存着金属碎片、飞船残骸与能量团的痕迹。绝大部分战舰依然可以正常作战，少量飞船处于受损状态。舰队并没有叛乱的痕迹，而且恰恰相反，每位舰长都在高呼您的名字。”

languages.text: «El informe está listo, Lord Capitán. La flota de Dargonus está en órbita en torno al mundo capital. El escudo de los von Valancius que decora las naves es inconfundible. Hay señales de combate reciente alrededor del planeta: trozos de metal, restos y aglomeraciones de energía. La mayoría de las naves están operativas, aunque algunas unidades están dañadas. La flota no muestra hostilidad alguna. Por el contrario, le saludan».
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius coat of arms on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

traits.locale_text: «El informe está listo, Lord Capitán. La flota de Dargonus está en órbita en torno al mundo capital. El escudo de los von Valancius que decora las naves es inconfundible. Hay señales de combate reciente alrededor del planeta: trozos de metal, restos y aglomeraciones de energía. La mayoría de las naves están operativas, aunque algunas unidades están dañadas. La flota no muestra hostilidad alguna. Por el contrario, le saludan».

languages.text: "Bereit für meinen Bericht, Lord Captain. Die Dargonus-Flotte wurde im Orbit um die Hauptstadtwelt gesichtet ... das Valancius-Wappen auf den Schiffen ist unverkennbar. Überall auf dem Planeten sind Anzeichen von Kämpfen zu sehen – Metallfragmente, Trümmer und Energiecluster. Der Großteil der Schiffe ist einsatzbereit, aber einige Einheiten sind beschädigt. Es wurde keine Aggression seitens der Flotte beobachtet ... im Gegenteil, die Kapitäne grüßen Euch."
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius coat of arms on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

traits.locale_text: "Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius coat of arms on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

languages.text: « Au rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! La flotte de Dargonus a été repérée en orbite autour du monde-capitale. Les armoiries des von Valancius ne laissent aucun doute sur l'allégeance de ces navires. Nous avons également relevé des signes de combat récent tout autour de la planète, sous forme de fragments métalliques, de débris ou d'amas d'énergie. La majorité des vaisseaux sont opérationnels, mais certaines unités sont endommagées. La flotte ne montre aucun signe d'agressivité. Au contraire, ses capitaines tentent d'entrer en contact avec vous. »
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius coat of arms on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

traits.locale_text: « Au rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! La flotte de Dargonus a été repérée en orbite autour de la capitale. Les armoiries des von Valancius ne laissent aucun doute sur l'allégeance de ces navires. Nous avons également relevé des signes de combat récent tout autour de la planète, sous forme de fragments métalliques, de débris ou d'amas d'énergie. La majorité des vaisseaux sont opérationnels, mais certaines unités sont endommagées. La flotte ne montre aucun signe d'agressivité. Au contraire, ses capitaines tentent d'entrer en contact avec vous. »

languages.text: 「ご報告があります、ロード・キャプテン。ダルゴナスの艦隊が首都惑星周辺の軌道上で目撃されました。船に施されていたのは、紛れもなくフォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章です。金属の破片に瓦礫、エネルギークラスター。最近戦闘があった痕跡が惑星のあちこちでハッキリと確認できます。船の大部分は動いていますが、一部の設備は損傷しているようです。艦隊に敵意は観察されていません…それどころか、船長達はこちらを歓迎しています」
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius coat of arms on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."

traits.locale_text: 「ご報告があります、ロード・キャプテン。ダルゴナスの艦隊が首都惑星周辺の軌道上で目撃されました。船に施されていたのは、紛れもなくフォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章です。金属の破片に瓦礫、エネルギークラスター。最近戦闘があった痕跡が惑星のあちこちでハッキリと確認できます。船の大部分は動いていますが、一部の設備は損傷しているようです。艦隊に敵意は観察されていません…それどころか、船長達はこちらを歓迎しています」

languages.text: "Rapor vermeye hazırım Lord Kaptan. Dargonus filosu, başdünyanın yörüngesinde görüldü. Geminin üzerinde von Valancius arması bulunduğu aşikâr. Gezegenin çevresinde yakın zamanda gerçekleşen bir savaşa dair metal parçalar, kalıntı yığınları ve enerji kümeleri gibi kanıtlar var. Gemilerin çoğunluğu faal durumda ancak bazı birimler hazar almış. Filodan herhangi bir saldırgan hamle gelmedi. Aksine kaptanlar sizi selamlıyor."
languages.original_text: "Ready to report, Lord Captain. The Dargonus fleet has been sighted in orbit around the capital world — the von Valancius coat of arms on the vessels is unmistakable. Signs of recent combat are in evidence around the planet — metal fragments, debris, and energy clusters. The majority of the vessels are operational, but some units are damaged. No aggression from the fleet has been observed — on the contrary, the captains are hailing you."
